javelin.controller.fight

Class Siege

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.fight.Fight
      • javelin.controller.fight.Siege
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TrainingSession

    public class Siege
extends Fight
    Battle when a player invades a hostile town.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Location.ishostile()

    • Field Detail

      • cleargarrison

        protected boolean cleargarrison
        If false will skip onEnd(BattleScreen, ArrayList, BattleState) but still call Fight.onEnd(BattleScreen, ArrayList, BattleState). This allows subclasses to take control of after-fight consequences.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Siege

        public Siege(Location l)
        Parameters:
        l - Where this fight is occurring at.

        Specified by:

        Returns:
